rules_text:
[i](As this enters, insert it into one of your three programs. At your first main phase each turn, the next program runs all its Subroutines.)[/i]
When this Subroutine enters, you may discard a card. When you do, it deals 4 damage to target creature or planeswalker.
Whenever this Subroutine runs, create a 4/4 red Error creature token with menace.
notes:
!tokens Program A ERR;Program B ERR;Program C ERR;red Error 44ERR
!
Sneak attack instead?
